trans-unit.source: Defines the invoking designer and message filters properties and the method that determines whether an activity is supported for all workflow root designers.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All workflow root designers are either of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> or inherit from it.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
If the current activity designer is the child of another activity designer, the parent designer is often also the invoking designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported on the current workflow designer.
The <xref:System.Type> to check for support on the designer.
if type is supported on the current workflow designer; otherwise, .
Gets any message filters associated with the workflow root designer.
A WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter read-only collection that contains any message filters associated with the workflow root designer.
Gets the value that indicates whether the actual workflow root designer supports the layout persistence.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the designer supports layout persistence; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
